Class YUV

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.hal.camera.YUV

public final class YUV
extends java.lang.Object

Simple container for a colour's Y, U and V values in the YUV colour space.

version 1.0.0

Dan Cowan
